attributes.review: I’m sure people are aware of Trump’s idiotic attempt to ban TikTok because it allows the Chinese to steal information from its users, but his app is basically the same thing. It tries to access your information and uses it to swing the election in his favor. This is no better than the Russian influence in the 2016 election, with the only difference being that Trump finally grew a pair and tried to rig the election himself. Garbage app, delete it ASAP.
attributes.title: Absolutely Hypocrisy

attributes.review: the app was absolutely terrible. and why make an app for a pedo? Supporting trump isn’t even a political opinion he’s a bad person overall.
attributes.title: bad.

attributes.review: This app kept crashing and whenever I went on it it just lagged so bad and I'm not even part of this whole gen z thing this app is just terrible

this app made my phone crash in any app. i have an iphone 8 and it still constantly crashed whether i’m in the app or not. this never happened before i got the app. and no i’m not a part of the tiktok trend. please don’t get this app.
